pros: For the casual-dressy look, these wallabees are a solid choice
Stand out for their comfort, which is better than most Clarks boots
Suede or leather uppers come in a variety of colors
cons: These boots are not the most durable and may show wear after several months

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these shoes for myself. Shoes were a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes for myself. Shoes were a little tight across the top while wearing them. Hopefully it will loosen up over time.....
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Canady

customer_reviews.title: Every thing is so good
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is awesome and fits perfectly the color is perfect as well and about the delivery it was soooooo fastest as I live in KSA and I received the shoes after 6 days only ...........amazing
customer_reviews.author: abdallah samir

customer_reviews.title: What Wallabees used to be..
customer_reviews.text: The comfort of the Clark's Orignal is a thing of the past. The crepe to soles do very little to compensate for the shoddy half insoles and odd sizing, which now feels exactly like walking on tight, thin cardboard. The Stinson is the new comfortable Wallabee, minus the crepe sole, which is a plus in my opinion. These shoes are very well made with a better sizing system. These are my second pair, in as many weeks and going down a half size will fit you perfectly. You can keep the newly made Originals which are neither authentic nor worth the high price tag anymore. These are my new go to shoes, at less than half the price.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: I will say that the Amazon returns policy has been very good. Just before writing this review I took the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a dozen different styles of Clarks shoes over the years but this is the first pair that I simply couldn't wrench my foot into. It was a size 10 medium width, the length seemed OK but the open space inside the shoe was way too snug a fit for my foot. I will say that the Amazon returns policy has been very good. Just before writing this review I took the re-packed box containing the shoes to a UPS store, got a shipping label there and was assured that my package will be shipped today.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Havens

customer_reviews.title: Great classic Clarks, you won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, origanal shoe box packaging, each shoe wrapped individually, i liked the small details. Size fits as expected, very well. Leather quality is great, color choice I think the best of all. Overall very well recommended. Cost is excellent. Enjoy your Clark's. See my photos for details, if you liked my review, please thumbs up. Thanks to seller, im really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr Slaboussov

customer_reviews.title: No warranty
customer_reviews.text: I got to say I like the shoe, except the stitching has started to come undone, itself a shame because it should have plenty more life in it for this reason I probably will not buy the shoe again unless the warranty will exchange it for a new pair. At this point for $100 shoe, I would not repurchase it because only after five months of use interior stitching on boot Is coming undone and soul is separating from the shoe in two separate places the hill and along the middle section .
customer_reviews.author: Tuna Poker

customer_reviews.title: I like!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I never owned a pair of Wallabees before so I can't make that comparison....BUT these I like. It took me a couple days to get use to the high arch support. That's because I have almost no arch in my feet. After a few wears I'm use to it and they are very comfortable. People ask.if they are Wallabees but I don't front like they are. Overall they feel great and look dope on my feet. I wear them around the office and people notice. I will buy another pair. Probably will get a pair of Wallabees next though.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these kinds of shoes for over 30 years. They always need to be replaced because I have worn the soles out. Not this brand! After 1 year and an estimated 5 months of use (I shattered my left leg and could not wear them for 7 months)... the leather (not the stitching) tore completely away from the shoe at the toe (a non-stress area). While they still look new and the soles are barely worn... they are now garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same shape as Wallabees.
customer_reviews.text: I have several of the original Wallabees in size 10 but got these in 10.5 to use with custom orthotics. These are the same shape, cut, and reasonably identical quality and stitching as the Wallabees, and just a few mm lower on the ankle. The Stinson sole is a slightly a harder ride, not being crepe, but I think most people won’t notice. The soles on these are harder don’t pick up quite as much color from the street as the crepe soles do. I’m happy to have an alternative to the crepe at a good price. I’ll update as they wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Kellner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Quality, and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Wallabee boots. I will regularly spend an entire day in them without so much as a tinge of pain in my feet. These boots have a timeless look to them that keeps them in style constantly. They look amazing with jeans but also can be worn with many business casual type pants. I've worn these with jeans and tee shirt or with dress pants and a sport coat. They look great, they feel amazing, and they continue to last. What more can I ask for? By far, the favorite pair of boots I've ever owned! They do run a little small, so as long as you order a half size up then you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, true to size, quick delivery, even carried my almost never available size of 11 1/2.. At 40% less than I paid the last time, I bought two pairs, black and oil brown, which is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Franky G.

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE MANY ST COMFY SHOES EVER MADE
customer_reviews.text: I LOBE CLARKS! FROM THE ELEGANT AND RUGGED DEAERT BOOT. TO THE STREET POUNDING WALABEES! WHEN I GOT THESE IT WAS LIKE A PIECE OF CHOCOLATE CAKE WAS DELIVERED TO ME! THE TEXTURE OF THE LEATHER. THE COLOR OF A TIOTSIE ROLL. THE ONLY REASON I DIDNT GIVE 5 STARS WAS BECAUSE THE DELIVERY SWRVICE CHOSEN BY AMAZON LIED ABOUT ATTEMPTED DELIVERY AND THE RUN AROUND THEY GAVE ME AT THE POST OFFICE. OTHER THAN THAT LOVE ‘EM!!! A BIT TIGHT BUT THAT STRETCHES IN TIME.
customer_reviews.author: BudWizer500

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They fit great right out of the box. Wore them all day the first day I had them on. Very comfortable, walking on concrete floors. Like the brown color. They do squeak a little on the concrete floor, but don’t care - they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Thorson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but impossible to put on.
customer_reviews.text: It is nearly impossible to put on without almost tearing them apart. You have to pull with a whole lot of strength. they won't last two months and if I wear them they won't let me return. So I prefer to return now that they are new. The material sticks to the socks no matter what kind, and the hole is tiny. Not possible to put on comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad these do not come in wide width
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be of good quality materials and construction, time will tell. The shoe does not have any "cush" in it at all and is a very "firm" platform. They seem to me a skimpy 10.5 and I think 11.0 would prove too long at the arch. Minimal arch support. I wish they were available in E-wide. These would be really fine if I had sufficient room to add a good sport support insole, if they last: it would be a five star shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMan

customer_reviews.title: Always get compliments when I wear these
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of boots that can be worn with a business casual look with khakis or dressed down with jeans. Very versatile shoe that is great in the rain/snow. I’ve gotten so many compliments on them from the first day I wore them. Even inspired friends or coworkers to go out and buy a pair of their own!
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Not my last pair of Clarks
customer_reviews.text: Traditional Clarks. They do fit run about a 1/2 big in most cases. These are no exception. Quality seems to be good. Product came null of any strange smells or wierd powders that shoes sometimes have from sitting around for long periods of time. I can't speak for the longevity of the shoe as I've only worn them once since purchase. Not my 1st pair of Clarks or my last.
customer_reviews.author: Damionus

customer_reviews.title: Clark's stinson shoe
customer_reviews.text: love the shoe and the colorway and the craftsmanship but the comfort particularly in the fore foot can be a lil bit uncomfortable when walking a long time in them the cushioning is ok and it fits nice it's just in my fore foot in the middle of my foot there's a little pinch feeling, but overalll I still like the shoe and will still wear them just not everyday.
customer_reviews.author: jemal

customer_reviews.title: Same as picture/shipping was SUPER FAST!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my son a 7.5 ,, but I have started getting him a 8 and the shoes are everything!! He has some growing room and that's what I wanted! The reviews about getting a half or a whole size down are correct. The shoes are the same as the picture,, color and ALL the above!!
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Gyrl

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these wallabies I wear them often to work and casually on the weekend. Good leather feels very high quality so far 👌. The gum bottom feels as though it will last overtime. I've always wanted to have a pair as a child but could not afford.
customer_reviews.author: devonjoker83

customer_reviews.title: ¡Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Just as I remember from the late ‘70s. These size 12 M Chukkas are absolutely to size. I’ll be wearing these without socks. If you wear them with socks, go a size larger. I’m a size US 12.5, having half sizes would be nice. I have a high instep, brand new it was snug getting them on. Fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley L Smith III

customer_reviews.title: The build quality of my favorite shoes has gone downhill.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the black leather version of these shoes for over 15 years. The build quality on my most recent pair isn't great. The upper stitching looks somewhat crooked. But my main problem are the soles. I usually get 1 or 2 years out of the soles before they are worn out. I've had this pair for about 6months and the soles look as bad as a pair 4x as old. They have recently started to squeak and sound like clown shoes. I won't be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jastremski

customer_reviews.title: Good product except for fit around my heel, too loose.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Clark’s for many years the heel section on these boots are loose compared to others I still own, same size. I only wear these around the house due to that fit around my heel. They look nice, comfortable every where but the heel.
customer_reviews.author: RLB DAB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: These clark chukka are a perfect fit, great casual look, suade feels soft. However the heel of the shoe is narrow and I've found myself almost springing my ankle on several occasions. Would not recommend to someone with weak ankles or a history of unstable ankles
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laycox

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍🏼 Comfort and Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Liked color and comfort. Great 👍🏼 Price and NOT MADE IN CHINA 🇨🇳!!!
customer_reviews.author: PJ & PS

customer_reviews.title: On point!
customer_reviews.text: These are not Wallabees....the sole has a sturdy feeling and great support. I own severl pairs of clarks.... Wallabees, Stinson, Tawyer....and I rock them all. The Stinson has a nice and sturdy sole....color is on point. The comfort of the shoe, clean casual yet stylish and can be worn with jeans, slacks or dress pants. I have been a fan and wearer of this brand for years. Your choice!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Always been a good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I've had Clarks shoes like this for several years and they've always been very comfortable. When they were made in England, they'd last a very long time. This pair is made in India so we'll see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: rjb77

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something comfortable for business travel as a project manager and came across these. I was hesitant at first if it would be the right quality and style but boy was I wrong. Very comfortable and although I wear size 12 in some shoes I got these in 11.5 and they first perfect. I have wide feet and this will save my toes. Goes well with every outfit I have. I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something comfortable for business travel as a project manager and came across these. I was hesitant at first if it would be the right quality and style but boy was I wrong. Very comfortable and although I wear size 12 in some shoes I got these in 11.5 and they first perfect. I have wide feet and this will save my toes. Goes well with every outfit I have. I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad. He likes the roper brand shoes that have the gum sole. But wears them out so fast. These Clark’s have a firmer sole and are a bit better made. He wore them all day yesterday and loved them! Said they fit perfect and verge super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are still comfortable shoes but the sole is not solid gum rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: They are still comfortable shoes but the sole is not solid gum rubber like they used to be. I had Clark’s for 5!years. When they finally wore out I ordered a new pair and to my disappointment I notice that after about 6 months of regular wear the soles started to wear through. I guess they went cheap and now I have to figure out what to buy next as these are not going to be my go to shoes anymore. I took pics but they don’t do any justice to what’s going on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I hold Clarks in high regard for the craftsmanship and style with their footwear. However this product didn't quite look as good as the picture and it was definitely very uncomfortable to wear. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Leopold

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised in original shoe box and in new condition. Shoe fits true to size. My first pair of Clark’s. A little hard to put shoe on. Fits comfortably, light weight and comfortable to have on all day. I like the shoe color. Saved about $20 over store price. We’ll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: dewmaniii

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good look for casual Fridays
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't order shoes online due to fear of getting the wrong size, but since these were much less than other places I decided to take a chance. These fit exactly my size (usually 10.5, and ordered a 10.5). I leave the bottom lace loose so I can get the shoe on and off easier, besides that the fit great.
customer_reviews.author: zeke

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them to wear when tending to my horse since I do not like western boots. I am a woman size 9W and I purchased the men's 8 so that they would be wide enough. They are a little narrow but as they were worn they stretched and molded to my foot. Waterproofed them and they are great work boots.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rummel

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as as one of my boyfriends birthday gifts. Not only are they great looking shoes, but they are true to size. I know others have stated they are a half to a whole size too large, but I haven't found this the case at all. I've ordered from shoes.Com before, awesome customer service which is rare these days. If there's an issue, they respond within 24 hours and if you catch them before your item actually ships, they can make any changes you might need, such as exchanges sizes, color, etc. I know some people compare these to the wallabees which my boyfriend and I both have, but for the money, the stinson look just as good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pair number three... and counting.
customer_reviews.text: What a classy and laid back kick! They are also very, very comfortable. They fit great because I happen to know that this style of Clark's always runs one half size too large. So it is best to subtract that much from your normal sheo size to ensure the most optimal fit. Anyhow, they are easily some of the best shoes on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Matrice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, nice style shoe that exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift and boy do I love these shoes. I wear a D width, size 13 and these shoes fit the bill. Very comfortable, high quality Clark brand. Was easy to find on Amazon during the holiday season, but not in local stores. Suede material is strong and well made. Would be hesitate to wear in environment where salt is used in the winter. Would likely stain the suede. I live in Atlanta where salt is not used to melt ice. Perfect weekender shoe. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Prime User

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband as he’s been wanting a pair of Clark’s for years! They’re usually $120+ range so to find them for $60 I had to jump on them, they came package really well and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just waste time & money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought again April 2017 but June 17 sole was gone & came out .I think glue quality is rubbish .just loss my money & time.Our trusted Amazon shouldn't allow these kind of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: NOT clark's originals
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has bought Wallabee's for 25+ years I was very surprised to receive the shoe. I didn't know there was a difference between ORIGINALS and COLLECTION. the sole is not one piece per usual, but three bonded pieces, it is tighter and harder to get your foot in, the tag is rubber, there is also another seam on the shoe. the shoe is FINE but ORIGINALS is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: dnkybk

customer_reviews.title: ... these shoes for my dad for Christmas and he loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my dad for Christmas and he loved them!!!! He still wears them and he suffers from foot problems but he said these are the most comfortable shoes he’s ever worn so I highly recommend and they fit him perfectly!! He likes them so much he wanted another pair in black!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ally D

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I found these shoes at a department store and the cost was over what I wanted to spend. I came across these on here and felt that this was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: fooled632

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: He had them already in brown, and repeatedly purchases them so I was glad to see them in black.....they seem very comfortable and supportive, with rubber soles for comfort. I will purchase these again, as he was pleasantly surprised to see them under the tree this year.
customer_reviews.author: Dyane Leight

customer_reviews.title: skinny feet
customer_reviews.text: Well mde, very nice, but; VERY narrow shoe. Not for wide feet.. w or xw sizes not EVEN available.
customer_reviews.author: zhafahzha

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, fair price, should have better ankle and arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but lower (around the ankle) than I prefer. Replaced the insoles for better support, but still a good value at the fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Teutsch

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for throwback style.
customer_reviews.text: I had these, albeit a different color--suede--when i was in high school. These are very expensive now and it was nice to get a pair for under $75. I love them--very comfortable and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: As good as I remember
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots in the 70s and loved them. These are just like the originals. Super comfortable after only wearing for an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blaize

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back and get a 1/2 size smaller, loved the shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrr..8!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had Clark’s before. When I saw the deal on these, I bought them. My feet are not good but I wore these shoes all day Saturday without any pain or discomfort. These shoes are GREAT!! Now, I’ll go back and get a black pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Reded45

customer_reviews.title: You can dress this shoe up or down.  They look great with jeans or khakis.
customer_reviews.text: I love wallabee Clarks. This color is amazing and looks much better in person. The toe and heel look darkened or burnt giving the shoe a nice stained look. They look rich in color and go with just about everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish. I require a lot of support as I have high arches. These shoes are like a custom made fit for me. I really like the extra cushioned soles. The good thing is the price. Very reasonable for a Clark shoe. There's two colors to choose. I chose the lighter ones and liked them so well that I'm ordering the darker ones. I wear a 9 1/2 and that's what I ordered. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Eldon McGuire

customer_reviews.title: I may need to go into a size nine. ...
customer_reviews.text: I may need to go into a size nine. I have always worn a 7-1/2, but I went into a 8-1/2 with the last Wallabee that I ordered about the time I turned 60 years old. I bought my first pair of Clark’s Desert Boot somewhere around 1965, and sometime after that the Wallabee’s came out. I bought them then and there and have worn them ever since. That was about 1968, so that’s 47 years that I have worn Wallabee's and fifty years that I have worn Clark's Boots. Thank you for a lifetime of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Chris de France

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these he says they feel like clouds on his feet..
customer_reviews.author: GODDESS

customer_reviews.title: looking for the original Chukka boots for a while
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of Chukka boots available, but not like these. This style is the same as my hubby wore in high school and he loved them then and still does! Fit is perfect, color is perfect. We would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ATL ladyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Hard sole. Great support.
customer_reviews.text: My son in law loved these shoes. He doesn’t have an arch so buying shoes is a little hard for him. He loves these. He said they have a hard sole that helps with his bad ankles, heels, and arch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Clark’s for the price
customer_reviews.text: As long as you understand that this is not the same as the Clark originals Wallabee you should not be disappointed. Its a great alternative for the price. Not quite as comfortable as the originals but also not uncomfortable in any way. The soles on these seem to be holding up better than the soft soles of the originals which is a good trade off IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these but need a shoe stretcher to widen the shoe for his fat feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: quality of clarks is great as expected, I have foot issues and with clarks, I usually don't have to wear my inserts because of the level of comfort of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They look great, and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The Stinson's are NOT Wallabees. They look great, and super comfortable, but they don't last as long. BUT that is why there is a price difference. I wear these 2-3 times a week and walk 7,000+ steps in them each day I wear them and they last a good 6-8 months. Great looking shoe and great feeling shoe for the price. But you can't expect the same durability as a Wallabee for half the price. Great bargain IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clark sizes are very big it’s make me so confused
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are vary and my size is USA 8 and Clark sizes are too big I. I order 8 size and it was just like a size 10 shoe
customer_reviews.author: Naveed Amer

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat Clarks
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, comfortable. I am very pleased with them. I ordered sz.10.5 mens and that is what normally wear. I recommend this product and will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: seon

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had to bring it back my wallaby clarks! So comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Barclay

customer_reviews.title: best shoes Ive ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: second pair of wallabees Ive owned. super comfy and feel like slippers. I love these things so much im sad come summer time and I wear shorts, because these can look goofy with shorts lol. but whenever I wear pants or jeans I wear them every time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for mine husband, and he loves it. Goes well with casual and dress clothing
customer_reviews.author: Denise Godding

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted these to my son for one of his Christmas presents as his old chukka-style shoes were completely worn out. He loves them and they are made very durable so they should last a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: dorisk8s

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband's favorite shoe. What a great choice and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Dean

customer_reviews.title: God, Himself would wear these. 🤖
customer_reviews.text: These are the shoes Jesus Christ would wear if he wasn't too busy being crucified and whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Vincent

customer_reviews.title: He loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Clark's for my seventeen year old birthday. He loved them so much!! The cost was $50.00 on Amazon, I checked JCP and they were $89.00. My son is pleased and I am extremely please.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: They sent the wrong show in the right box smh
customer_reviews.text: It's a Clark's shoe so it fits nice but I order the bees wax cor and they sent the boy brown leather smh so disappointed so now I have to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Not the original crepe soles...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn out the original crepe soles on my desert trekkers and took a chance on the more dense rubber soles. So far so good. Lots of support without being too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sacigar

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and are very comfortable. One star removed for the fact that the shoes squeak when I walk. Super annoying, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: jjblaes1

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality design and could be a copy also not what I expected in real life or in person.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my grandson, and he has just about worn the soles off thiem. He absolutely loves the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jdent

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and well priced
customer_reviews.text: Stinson are not Wallbys. Unlike the crepes sole of the Walkaby, the Stinson’s sole is a three piece rubber construction. However it is extremely comfortable. I do not know if it will prove as durable as the more expensive Wallaby, I only have had them for a week, but I am very satisfied especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mel E. Albin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe. Classic look
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfort. I use it for work with chinos and for casual with jeans. Easy on/off with no break in required
customer_reviews.author: BERO

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of shoes. I love the look of the shoes and cannot wait to give to my husband for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. He wares them every day... smh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sad they had such a short lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: Had these Clark's for not even six months, the side of the shoe wall on the right shoe gave way and I found myself walking on the outside of the shoe. Needless to say, I can't wear them anymore because they're so uncomfortable, which is really sad. They used to be the most comfy pair of shoes I owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Loving my purchase so far. Bought mine one size down by mistake . Because I wear a 11Uk but bought a 10UK. Didn't realize the size was in US when I clicked Buy . but anyways they fit great and they look great .
customer_reviews.author: garrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the heel on this shoe is too narrow for my comfort, otherwise it is a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campsmith

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit, like the styling. These are very comfortable shoes. I was not expecting the color to be so light-I had ordered these shoes before, and they were a much darker, more beige color. This limits the wearability of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Don R. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great soles
customer_reviews.text: Nice chucka great Hightower. Fit great and are extremely comfortable. Would buy another pair for sure. Only suggestion would be to use round shoestrings which would be shsrp
customer_reviews.author: GSunderland

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son,he has a business class in high school and they have to dress professional.He's not really into dressing up so he's not into the shiny lace dressy shoes so he looked into these and he really liked them.I'm very against ordering anything online for the first time but I will tell you, you will not be disappointed!!..if a cool teenager really liked them I'm sure you all will too.I love them myself and he gets compliments ALL the time also!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Barillas

customer_reviews.title: Would purse again..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My son loves these.. Fast shipping and great quality 👍🏻👍🏻! Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia dillaha

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the shoes. He wears a 11, so I ordered 11 and it fits as desired and he stated it has a lil stretch to it.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Cute cool✌😎
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes my dog ate my old ones and these are great and comfortable as usual
customer_reviews.author: Keri C Smith

customer_reviews.title: What a great shoe! I looked for this product in many ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great shoe! I looked for this product in many local stores, but was unable to find it. Imagine my delight, when I found it online and at this great price. I immediately told family and friends, who said that they would try to make a purchase soon. I remember the shoes as a favorite, when I was a child. Clark delivers a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Shop Amazon only! It's the best one stop & shop online experience
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my wallabies, definitely one of them my favorite shoes made by Clarks. There's nothing negative to say about the shoe and shopping with Amazon what's the best move I ever made. Great shoe great service great price. An awesome shopping experience. Kudos Amazon! My only online shopping source, thanks... to all the Amazon shoppers out there, I urge you all 2 try this brand
customer_reviews.author: Latarus Williams

customer_reviews.title: Scratch easy
customer_reviews.text: My husband did not like this shoes because it scratches way too easily.
customer_reviews.author: tracian malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chukka, wrong texture
customer_reviews.text: The leather wasn’t the texture I expected. The photos make the leather appear smooth, almost shiny. This is not that boot. The leather is (for lack of a better description) more natural, unfinished, less refined in its texture. I even added oil and they just soaked it up with no change. It’s ok, they still look ok, but the photos are a bit deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: KLongshore

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be resoled.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these boots before and I enjoyed them because of the soft sole. They are also I believe a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, high quality product
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. I bought a half size down from my usual shoe size (as I do with all my Clarks) because the shoe stretches to fit your feet comfortably after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Made in England vs Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Clarks shoes for a good portion of my life. Many years ago I stopped it because they became Made in China as they were of less quality and worksmanship. They were superb when they were "Made in England". I used one pair of U.K. Made for 15 years. They steel look great to me. But one day my wife got tired of them and gave them away. Recently, I decided to give them another try. They look fine. How long they will last, to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Zabi Bagheri

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and look
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my dad,the leather is beautiful and the fit is great.
customer_reviews.author: CHE

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are better than good. Additionally, the price listed with Amazon is 50% cheaper than the Clark's store.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquay Bland

customer_reviews.title: Priced right
customer_reviews.text: When it's a Clark product the expectation is quality. Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Pennsylvania Sean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Experience with purchase and delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The Clarks fit like a glove. I’m very happy with my order and with the delivery quickness.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Santana

customer_reviews.title: Badly advertised she’s, guesswork in width.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get my foot inside. Shoes were too small, & not wide enough. I’m a big guy, With a 11 1/2 EE width. You did not have my width. Shoe shown did not state width. I sent them back, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Giardini

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit
customer_reviews.text: Love them wish I could find them in light blue
customer_reviews.author: Moises Alonso

product_meta.title: Clarks Men's Stinson Hi Chukka Boot
product_meta.description:
Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.

Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
feature_bullets: The heel height is 1.25 inches and the upper material is suede.
